page.title: 15 LIFE STYLES
page.content: Mr Baker has lived in this area all his life.He had to walk to school because there were not many cars around and not many people took bikes to school.The most popular game at school was rounders.The school leaving age then was 14.His job was farming,he started farming in 1922 and the same year as he started farming there was a big change, most farmers changed from horse and cart to tractors.Before the change tractors were very rare.He was farming for over 50 years.He had to walk everywhere as well as to clubs for entertainment.There used to be nightclubs then in Ludlow and dancing was very popular.His favorite toy was a little railway engine but he never had any railway track. When it was difficult to get to Ludlow because of poor transport, it was the custom for a traveller to come
